content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a person named Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] How did you start the conversation?
[Answer] I started the conversation by introducing myself as Max Müller from Germany and thanked the landlord for the opportunity to see the apartment in München. I then proceeded to discuss the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] What was the agreed-upon rental price?
[Answer] The agreed-upon rental price was 1250 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] How would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner?
[Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as 10.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Did you feel discriminated or offended at any point in the negotiation?
[Answer] No
name: Max Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] If I felt discriminated or offended, why did I feel that way?
[Answer] However, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point in the negotiation.
name: Max Müller
